thoughts.text: I think it would be helpful to use the 'browse_website' command to visit the National Geographic website and explore the resources available.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the 'browse_website' command can help me visit the National Geographic website and explore the resources available. This can be a quick and efficient way to find resources that align with my goals.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'browse_website' command to visit the National Geographic website.
- Explore the different resources available, focusing on areas that may contain interesting resources related to exploration and learning.
- Take note of any interesting ideas or concepts.
- Report back to the user with my findings.
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful to evaluate the credibility and reliability of any sources that I find on the website.
thoughts.speak: I would like to use the 'browse_website' command to visit the National Geographic website and explore the resources available. I will focus on areas that may contain interesting resources related to exploration and learning, take note of any interesting ideas or concepts, and report back to you with my findings.

args.question: What are the resources available on the National Geographic website related to exploration and learning?
